device noun [C]
(MACHINE)

B2 an object or machine that has been invented for a particular purpose: a contraceptive/electronic devicedevice for Rescuers used a special device for finding people trapped in collapsed buildings. Synonyms
appliance
contraption
gadget
gizmo informal
widget
a machine, for example a phone or computer, that can be used to connect to the internet: You can stream music on your tablet or other mobile device.
More examplesFewer examplesThe listening device was concealed in a pen.The president's car is equipped with a homing device as a security measure.It's an artificial device that stimulates the auditory areas of the brain.We have a device that switches the lights on at a preset time in the evening.A mouse is a device that makes it easier to select different options from computer menus.
